item.title: Consumer prices likely stayed elevated in December as data recovers from shutdown

item.title: New video shows the minutes before immigration officer fatally shoots woman in Minneapolis
item.description: A new video reveals the moments before a federal immigration officer shot and killed a woman in Minneapolis

item.title: US carbon pollution rose in 2025. Experts blame cold winter, data centers
item.description: Researchers say the United States emitted 2.4% more greenhouse gases in 2025 than the previous year
